triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: The paper addresses multi-agent reinforcement learning as the core problem domain.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning is the fundamental methodology underlying the approach.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: PPO is a policy gradient method that forms the basis of Independent PPO.

triples.name: Proximal Policy Optimization
triples.relevance: The paper proposes Independent PPO, a variant of the PPO algorithm for multi-agent settings.

triples.name: Actor-critic algorithm
triples.relevance: Value function estimation relates to actor-critic methods that combine policy and value-based learning.

triples.name: StarCraft
triples.relevance: SMAC is a benchmark built on StarCraft that is used to evaluate the proposed approach.
